resources.string: Experienced full-stack Java/Kotlin\ndeveloper with 4 years of hands-on experience on enterprise software development and legacy code modernization. Skilled in full stack solutions development and complete SDLC phases.

Languages: Java 8, Kotlin
Web: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, JSP, Typescript, jQuery
Web Services: Rest and SOAP
Frameworks: Spring boot, Angular 6+, Mockito, Hibernate
Databases: MySQL, MongoDB, Oracle DB
Design Patterns: Observer, Singleton, State, Decorator, Command, Façade, Composite, and Factory
Tools: Maven, Jenkins, Postman, Git, IntelliJ, Eclipse, DBeaver, Studio3t, SoapUI, Jira, Bitbucket, Kafka, StarUML

Solutions-driven and inventive Java full stack developer with 4 years of diverse experience in developing organizational/client effectual applications, mainly Microservices. Skilled in technologies like Java 8+, Kotlin, Spring, Angular 6+, Design patterns, Oracle, MySQL and MongoDB. Holding a BSc & BCom Hons in Computer Science and Information Technology, currently pursuing a MSCS.
Master of Science in Computer Science
Bcom Hons in Infor Systems & Technology
Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
Full Stack Java Developer\nCape Town, South Africa • 2021 - 2021
Operated diverse verticals of system integration among various policy tracking and management systems.
Java Software developer\nCape Town, South Africa • 2019 - 2021
Enabled transition of complex legacy codebase to Java micro-services.
Gained knowledge and exposure in collaboration with accomplished developers on major projects. Supported team in evaluation and documentation of current software glitches.
I am available for new projects.
Full-stack Developer · Java Software Engineer · Android Developer
United States · Michigan, Chicago, Texas, Des Moines
